entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,341Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 220

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! And He has a task to fulfill, a mission to accomplish: prevent the Love-Square from forming. Be the home-wrecker and steal Marinette from Adrien. Is he going to do it? For the sake of the mission? We'll see.

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 297,776Chapters: 21/77Kudos: 1,854

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham? Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby). A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?! ___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work. Updating Monthly Maribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,049Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 124

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once.Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition.They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son.As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

entry.title: Corporate Jargon
entry.summary:
Author: ggomo_springtime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,798Chapters: 16/22Kudos: 1,169

Summary: It was the most peculiar thing to see Daniel Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng vehemently turn down a project. There was disgust. Barely concealed loathing. What was so strange about their bosses’ offer? They were about to be given a chance to redesign the suits of Justice League members and renovate part of the Watchtower.On a completely unrelated note, an incident with the Order and the use of ectoplasm forces the Celestial Guardian and the King of the Infinite Realms to finally meet.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,705Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 37

entry.title: In The Village Of The Butterfly
entry.summary:
Author: Fangirl_Who_Died

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,349Chapters: 4/19Kudos: 5

Summary: Deeming situations in Gotham now unsafe for Damian, Bruce sends him to Paris until further notice. Damian insists that he can very well handle himself as he has been training since he could walk, maybe even help with the Gotham situation. Bruce does not comply.Zoé and Adrien try to navigate through love as they now stand on opposite sides of battle, struggling to keep their love alive while fighting for the goal of their life.And Marinette is reeling. Maybe Damian really wasn't the one for her…

entry.title: Staying At Wayne Manor
entry.summary:
Author: FoxyRouge_99

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,449Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 127

Summary: Ok so this is a working title so probs will be changed.Damianette is already official. After Lila joined the class, Marinette's world went downhill. She lost all her friends and people she could trust. But with help from her partner and new friends, Hawkmoth was defeated. Now with identities revealed and new revelations, there is no use for the miraculous. But after the Miraculous Trio (as they now call themselves) join the Justice League to help with abroad crime, things start to look up. After Marinette meets robin, and then afterwards Damian, they both immediately hit it off. A year later, Damianette is official (but secret), friendships are blooming and all is well. But then, the akuma class wins a trip to Gotham to stay at Wayne manor. With Lila and web of lies following, Marinette goes to Gotham. Now reunited with her boyfriend, it is getting all the harder to keep them a secret. Will they manage it? Will Lie-la and her lies get their first? Will she be exposed?

entry.title: letters to lovers (and the aftermath of cherry wine)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 174,535Chapters: 46/?Kudos: 3,435

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne-Al Ghul are pen-pals for three years, during that time, Marinette slowly but surely falls in love (and Damian falls with her). Damian has to heal from his childhood and Marinette is still changing from growing pains; they are leaving partners and friends and toxicity and gods behind them.**Warning: reading this may cause whiplash-inducing criterion shift.You will no longer view anger as mad or friends the same way. Your concepts of "childhood" and "the right thing" will forever be changed. You will not be able to change it back.The average species lasts four million years on earth. We've been around for 300,000 of those years, but our ancestors were born six million years ago. To live you must adapt; change. Are you changing? What does that say about you?Reading this may cause delusions. You might start seeing ghosts. Or get a therapist.

entry.title: I Accidentally Found Out My Father’s Secret, My Stepsister’s a Pathological Liar, and Now I’m Teaming Up with Ladybug (Who Might Be Her Nemesis… and She’s Kinda Cute, So That’s Fine)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,883Chapters: 4/12Kudos: 11

Summary: Tim Drake’s minor prank shockingly escalates into a deadly blood feud, forcing Damian Wayne to re-evaluate his origins and who he should be loyal to. Damian believes he’s the son of Deathstroke, so he embarks on a desperate mission to prove his true identity to his father, Bruce Wayne, by hunting down and killing Deathstroke himself. The fallout from this ordeal leaves Damian shaken, setting him on a new path to find any other children his parents may have sired. His quest leads him to Paris, where a DNA test confirms a shocking truth: he has an older sister named Lila Rossi, a secret daughter of Bruce Wayne! He is now obligated to take the girl in; a vast conspiracy claimed the House of Waynes, and he is compelled to protect one of their own, regardless of her wishes.

entry.title: To Protect The Gods (Or To Protect My Goddess)
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,593Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 541

Summary: Damian had a friend. Someone he cared for so dearly he gave her a way to contact him if she ever needed him. He swore, that were she to ever call on him, he would be there.Not once in 9 years did she ever call for him.The day she did was the worst day of Damian's life.

entry.title: Breaking His Walls While Building Hers
entry.summary:
Author: Stellar_Arachnida

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 146Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Marinette has been chosen, or more like she was pushed to agree to be selected for the Foreign Exchange program hosted by the Gotham Academy and Collège Françoise Dupont. New adventures await our resident hero of Paris as she takes more responsibility onto her plate. Trying to learn her boundaries and lines that no one should cross, would she be the one to break the highly guarded heart of the one and only Damian Wayne? Additionally, in a dark space with few lights passing through, another shadow lurks... something wicked is brewing?

entry.title: How'd We Meet? Playing Video Games
entry.summary:
Author: AgentofSciFi

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,743Chapters: 52/?Kudos: 494

Summary: Rewrite of "How'd We Meet? Video Games"Hello Ultimate Mecha Strike Players! You are currently one of the top 150 players for your server. You have been entered into an international tournament! Each player will be randomly paired with 6 other people, from all over the world. You will have 10 weeks to prepare before the tournament. May the best Mecha team win!No one could have predicted what one video game tournament would turn into, but it sets these seven kids on a path that would shape the next generation of superheroes.*Tags will be added as I continue on with the story, I don't want to give too much away at the beginning

entry.title: Steal My Phone, Steal My Heart (Daminette)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,636Chapters: 18/20Kudos: 185

Summary: After 48 sleepless hours in Paris, a disheveled Marinette accidentally grabs the wrong phone—belonging to a rude American tourist. What follows is a chaotic chain of misadventures across the city. But as the day spirals out of control, could this unexpected mix-up be the start of something better?
